entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 11:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -18.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -21.4°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
